product_fidelity: do not change product shape or structure
do not add elements to the product
do not remove parts of the product
do not change material textures of the product
do not add branding or text to the product
furniture_specific: do not bend straight edges or legs

game_specific: do not scatter game pieces randomly
keep game components together and organized
preserve text and numbers on game pieces if visible
maintain correct color coding of game elements
